version_description:
In this update we fixed the issues that causing crash using the integrated browser.
We also added m3u support casting and we improved the videos conversion as well.

If you like our new update please take a moment to write a review and if you have any questions you can always write us at contact@cryft.com

Screen mirroring app supports now the big iPad screen.
I worked a little bit on the browser feature to support more websites and casual bug fixing.

We apologise for the issues you were having with the Screen Mirroring feature on iOS 12.x
In this update we got them fixed for you.

If there is any other issues please write us at contact@benabid.me

Stay healthy everyone!

Hello everyone,
in this version we changed our DLNA approach to support even more devices.
We fixed couple of issues reported in the integrated browser.
If you have suggestions or issues to be reported please address them to contact@benabid.me
Thank you
